titleStmt.title: SII 13.217: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 217. (A.R. No. 10 of 1931.) TIRUKKŌḌIKKĀVAL, KUMBAKONAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, TIRUKKŌṬĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This is stated to be a copy of an old inscription on a loose stone and hence to cancel that document. It records an endowment in the shape of 360 kalam of paddy made by Māsēṉaṉ Mādaṉ of Śiṟukāṭṭūr in Mē[r*]kkā-nāḍu and left in charge of the assembly of Narasiṅgamaṅgalam in Nallāṟṟūṟ-nāḍu for providing, with the interest thereon, daily offerings and a perpetual lamp in the temple of Mahādēva at Tirukkōḍikkā.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . Ituvum moru paḻaṅkalpa(ṭ)ṭi . kovirājakesari
panmarkku yāṇṭu 10 1- tirukkoṭikāvil mahādevarkku meṟkkāṉāṭṭuc ciṟukāṭṭuruṭai yāṉ(ā) māceṉaṉ mātaṉ kuṭutta nellu muṉṉūṟṟu Āṟupatiṉkalam Innelluk koṇ ṭom nallāṟṟūrnāṭṭu naraciṅkamaṅkalattu sabhaiyom Innelli
ṉ palicaiyāl tiruvamiḻtu kuttal nicati Irunāḻi Ariciyum tiruviḷakku nicati Uḻakku neyyum non=tāviḷakku m(ā)cantrārka kālamum taḷi Arccippāṟkku Okkum nāḻiyā laḷantu kuṭuppomāṉom naraciṅkamaṅkalattu sabhaiyom Itu paḻayakalppaṭi In=ta śrīvimā
vājagam veṭṭikkiṭan=ta taṉikkallāl Ubhaiyokam Illāmaiyil Atu tavirnt(ā)tu Ivai muṭṭil pa
Digital edition of SII 13.217 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
